divs: Sighting Detailsi have observed sevel times most of the time two star like objects about one every couple of weeks from my backyard flying from a south to north direction too high too be a plane no flash or red or blue position lights like a plane one is usesuly bright blue like the north star and the the other one is dim white today i saw the same thing on diffence i saw one bright blue star like light and 4 dim white light flying from the southwest going northwest direction no sound moved at about 10000 ft plus attude and disspeared towards the san gabriel mountain range did not have regular air craft position lights. this time i saw it from my frt yard about 5-10min after a power outage on block. i was smoking a ciggrett when i witness it i did not take my eyes off of it and i used other bright stars in the sky as a refence point to verify that they were moving. i thought at first it was possibly the internal space station or possible satalites but they were too close together in my opinon to be satalitte.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Temple City
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: star like one bright blue and five dim white
